Class FileInfoMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • com.risk.model.FileInfoMenu
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class FileInfoMenu
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.io.Serializable
    Instruction: Within Model's loadFile() method if file is valid call setValidationResult(true, validInfo) else call setValidationResult(false, invalidInfo) then call update();
    See Also:
